0.description: A comprehensive office area with window blinds, a desk and tables, multiple chairs, electronics (computer, keyboard, two TVs, phone), a lamp, a globe, and a trashcan.

1.description: A trio of wall-mounted shelves partially occupied by a few books.

2.description: A standalone bookshelf densely packed with several stacks of books.

3.description: A functional corner featuring a wall-mounted whiteboard alongside a grouping of clothes.

4.description: A solitary sofa placed independently for casual seating.
